channel.title: Week7 on Placeholder & Co.
channel.description: Recent content in Week7 on Placeholder & Co.

item.title: Week 7: Meeting With Professor Tuul Triyason
item.description:
Discussion

I had a meeting with Professor Tuul Triyason about which project or research to do that is more related to cybersecurity. He recommended me several ideas, such as building a CTF website for him with heavy topics on web security, and also a network intrusion prevention system comparative analysis. Personally, I was more intrigued by the IPS part because it is something that I have heard before from my past project member. Fortunately, he gave me the task to make a comparative analysis between Suricata and Stratosphere Lab IPS. From here, I started to do my own research on what Stratosphere Lab IPS (SLIPS) and Suricata are. This was where the professor told me to provide him a documentation on how to install and configure SLIPS together with the comparative analysis report.

IC2 Website Update

Khush and me brainstorm some ideas on what to put in IC2 Homepage. So I came up with an idea to put in more content and images to make the homepage more engaging with parallax design.

item.title: Week 7: Makan Place nearby KMUTT
item.description:
Eat With Bear: A Western Feast at KMUTT’s Doorstep

The craving for a solid Western meal hit us hard today. While wandering near KMUTT, we were stopped in our tracks by a massive, unmissable bear mascot standing guard outside a storefront. Driven by hunger and curiosity, we decided to check it out.

We discovered Eat With Bear, and it was exactly what we needed. The moment we stepped inside, we were greeted by a surprisingly spacious and welcoming interior—perfect for hanging out after class.

But the real showstopper? The salad bar.

They offer a fantastic variety of fresh greens and toppings. And here is the best part: it’s free-flow. (Note: The unlimited salad bar is complimentary when you order specific main dishes, so check the menu first!)

I decided to go big and ordered the Chicken Burger. “Huge” is an understatement—this thing was a tower! It came paired with onion rings that were fried to golden perfection—crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, and completely addictive.

If you are near the university and need a burger fix, this is the spot. Address: 368 ซอย จุฬาฯ 1 Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Bangkok 10330
